settings.text:
Need Help?

Message Us Contact Us

settings.question_faqs: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
settings.answer_faqs:
1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: glasso-1.0.0-sections-ready.zip in the folder Glasso Sections Ready 1.0.0 then you just need to upload glasso-1.0.0-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

settings.question_faqs: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.answer_faqs:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.question_faqs: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.question_faqs: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.question_faqs: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our
settings.answer_faqs: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don’t want to scale the image.

settings.question_faqs: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.

settings.question_faqs: Can I have multi level menu?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.answer_faqs: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark “Urgent” in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support Variant Image?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://glasso-theme.myshopify.com//collections/new-releases/products/daciniado-metropolis-darturien

settings.product_tab_content:
About shipping and fulfillment

We understand customer's concern and build up the complete fulfillment system, and we are ready to fulfill each order with the safe, quick, traceable and economic package solution.

Normally customers can receive the package in 7 -12 days or so if ship from our factory warehouse, we also have ready stock for the major products in local warehouses in US, UK, Germany and Australia etc with faster delivery solution by FBA service etc.

There are different fufillment solutions to cover the global area and meet customer's needs: We provide the free shipping solution for the light package at standard shipping zone to save shipping cost for customers, the logistics provider 4PX has established the global delivery network in more than 170 countries with the local official post system.

For the high value product, we can choose to delivery by DHL and offer the special discount support for the shipping cost.

Please kindly refer to more details about the order shipping tracking and the shipping policy at page link: https://ehiatech-muban-19.myshopify.com/pages/shipping）

About return and refund

As one of the leading manufacture and brand owner of Mileseey, we sincerely look forward to customer's feedback and comment, we have the standard procedures and policy to gather and manage the feedback and discuss the improvement solutions with customers, this is very important to improve our product, service and the R&D development of new products.

For all the products purchased from our official brand store (www.mileseeytools.com), our service center will follow the standard procedure and policy to handle customer's request of return with 2 working days, and provide the optional, reasonable and professional solutions to keep customers satisfied. When the refund is processed, a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment, within a certain amount of days

Please kindly refer to more details about the procedure and policy of return and refund at the support page

How can I make a puchase from this store?
Just create an buyer account with your email address easily and have special benefits of promotion or discount automatically, then follow the simple instruction and order process to complete the order and payment easily. When completing an order, please kindly make sure the shipping address details are correct and post code is necessary.

Do you ship overseas?
Yes, we can ship the package to the global area under different fulfilment solution and shipping rate. The shipping solution and rate will be displayed at checkout.

Do you have stock for the ordered products?
Yes, we always keep enough ready stock for all products. If the product is out of stock, then the system will display the information of "out of stock" at the area of stock qty in the product page and not available to complete an order.

When the order can be shipped?
The warehouse handle orders under the batch processing, normally it needs 1-2 business days to complete the bulk order handling process, perpare and check product, pack and label, pick up and transit to logistics center for further scanning and delivery.
Customers can find the shipment tracking records with the global tracking link within 2-3 days.
For more details or policy of shipping and fulfillment, please kindly refer to the colunm of "shipping and return' or the guideline page at ""

Are you the manufacture?
Yes, we are one of the leading manufacture in laser technology products with more than 13 years of experience in R&D, manufacture and marketing, We are the brand owner of Mileseey and"www.mileseeytools.com" is our official brand store. We sell products to more than 50 countries in the global market including North America, South America, EU, UK, and most Asia countries.

Is there any promotion or discount?
We run the regular discounts and promotions, so stay tuned for exclusive deals and take the chance to have the desired product.

Do you support distribution or reselling business?
yes, we can provide long term support for distribution or reselling business, and also support dropshipping business, just send us more details about cooperation at page link: https://ehiatech-muban-19.myshopify.com/pages/contact-us

Is there warranty for the product?
Yes, we have limited warranty for all products purchased on www.mileseeytools.com. If the products are purchased from the other 3rd platform as Amazon etc, the warranty need to follow the policy of both the original store and the 3rd party platform. For more details of warranty, please kindly refer to the terms and policy at the guideline page of "warranty policy".

Is there any information support such as operation manual or video?
Yes, we continue to update the valuable information to support customers, just click our brand ico"MILESEEY" and go to the home page, under the menu of "Support" there is download service for instruction manual, in the video page, there are rich videos to display the function or operation of our products, and in the blog page, we will update the latest technology solution, share the feeling, experience and skills from our consumers in difference application and scenes.

Can I sign up to your newsletter?
Yes! Just enter your email here, and you’ll be added to our subscription list. You’ll be sent updates, exclusive offers, and much more.

Where can I get customer support faqs at Mileseey?
By moving the mouse on the “Support” which is on the top of the column, you can click “contact us” for customer support and you can get FAQ from the “FAQ” button.

What’s the rangefinder scope of the Mileseey’s rangefinders?
Mileseey’s rangefinders range from 600m to 2000m. You can select the suitable one according to your needs.

What’s special about the Mileseey rangefinder battery?
Mileseey rangefinders own dual power supply and they are CR2-3V battery and lithium battery. CR2-3V battery possesses the merits of long battery life, low power consumption and fast power recovery. About the lithium battery, it is rechargeable. Mileseey rangefinder adapts a large capacity of 1000mAh lithium battery, which is lightweight and can serve for a long time. These two types of batteries ensure that there is an emergent situation. So you won’t worry about the rangefinder runs out of electricity. Choose the one that you need.

About golf rangefinder-PF260

1. What are the differences among other Mileseey golf rangefinders?

The biggest difference is that the golf rangefinder PF260 has a slop on/off function, which is favorable in the game. In addition, it’s rechargeable and a magnetic strap is designed for easy attachment. Except that, there are more practical functions for you to explore. Please see the description column to learn more about it. Besides, the PF260 is equipped with dual power supplies. That prevents inadequate electricity when it is working.

2. Do you have any other types of golf rangefinders for sale?

Sure, we do. We have PF210 basic, PF210 pro, PF260, PF3H, PFS1, PF280pro, and PF3S. See our product category of Outdoor rangefinder. (https://www.mileseeytools.com/collections/mileseey-rangefinder)

settings.title: Find The Right Headphone For You

settings.text:
I always remember a conversation

"A rangefinder costs more than 3,000 yuan. Is there anything cheaper?"

"No, this product is not made in China, it is made by large international companies." The other party said.

"It's too expensive, I can't afford it."

At this time, the other party teased me, "If you can make such a product at a lower price, we can underwrite as many units as you want!"

To this day, I can clearly remember that day, by chance, I was preparing my master's thesis. The English of "flow meter" is heard as "distance meter".

So I searched the Internet, clicked a webpage, and made a consultation call. Just because of this phone call, I entered a field of precision measurement that was still blank in China at that time.

I found that in China after 30 years of reform and opening up, many technology-based companies have followed the development path of learning, imitating, and catching up, and even bred fast-growing and world-renowned Chinese companies.

However, in the field of precision measurement, China is still in its infancy. I believe that in the next 10 years, Chinese companies will surely catch up with international giants in this field, and will also breed international stars in this industry.

And I firmly believe that we will be one of them. Because we always have a concept, that is to bring customers a complete overturn of the traditional design of the industry,

Perfect combination of technology and customer experience, let architects, designers and other professional customers and home users know, like, and rely on the products of Shangmai Test!

On behalf of my colleagues, I will use an infinite enthusiasm for work, tenacious struggle for the cause, and team spirit to persevere to overcome all kinds of difficulties, to make the best products for you, and to realize the China in my phone call.

settings.title: Year
settings.text: Laser measurement and control<br class="br_pc"> research and development experience

settings.title: Nation
settings.text: Global sales coverage

settings.title: Item
settings.text: Intellectual property

settings.title: Square meter
settings.text: Standardized Manufacturing Center

Founded in 2009, Shenzhen Mileseey Technology Co.,Ltd is a high-tech enterprise integrating industrial design, R&D, manufacturing and marketing.

It has focused on the field of laser measurement and control for more than ten years.

Up to now, Mileseey has submitted a total of 129 invention patents, utility model patents and other intellectual property applications.

The products have been sold to more than 50 countries around the world, covering more than 8 million users. It is the preferred partner of major brands at home and abroad.

More than ten years of perseverance and struggle have wintnessed Mileseey's pivotal position in the industry.

In the next ten years, Mileseey will be committed to becoming a leader in China's precision laser measurement and control industry, a global diversified technology company, and making the world a better place.
settings.tips:
The company adheres to the main line of laser measure and expands diversified businesses.

Its main products include four categories:

Laser measure products: laser distance meter, wall detector, laser level, etc.

Visual imaging products: laser rangefinder /infrared thermal imager/night vision etc.

Intelligent detection products: salinity meter, sugar meter, etc.

Industrial sensing products: laser ranging sensor, laser displacement sensor, lidar, etc.

Application areas: cutting-edge industries such as architectural design, home improvement, surveying and mapping, engineering surveys, smart railway transportation, smart cities, smart logistics, industrial automation etc.

settings.title: Can I sign up to your newsletter?
